title: Twitter Sentiment Analyzer
memo: Build a system to fetch tweets using the Twitter API and analyze their sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) using NLTK. Present the results visually.

title: Resume Auto-Tagger
memo: Create an app that analyzes resumes and auto-tags them with relevant skills and job roles, using classic ML or NLP pipelines.

title: Image Anomaly Detector
memo: Develop a convolutional neural network (CNN) to spot anomalies in manufacturing images, such as identifying defects in produced parts.

title: AI-powered News Aggregator
memo: Design a service to collect news articles, summarize them with AI (use Hugging Face models), and visualize topic trends over time.

title: Prompt Tuning Playground
memo: Create an interactive app to experiment with different prompts on LLMs (e.g., OpenAI, Cohere). Track performance and share results.

title: Automated Job Offer Matcher
memo: Prototype a system that matches a candidate's profile to relevant AI job postings, using basic matching and business logic.
